title: Annual Sports Day
content: Join us for a day of fun and sportsmanship! The event will include track and field, team sports, and more.

title: Science Exhibition
content: Students will showcase their science projects and experiments. Don't miss out on discovering new ideas and innovations.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
content: This is a mandatory meeting to discuss the progress of your child. Parents are encouraged to attend.

title: Cultural Night
content: An evening filled with music, dance, and performances by students from different cultures and backgrounds.

title: Charity Fundraiser
content: A fundraising event to support local communities and charitable causes. Students will be organizing different activities.
